Text: i love, LOVE yify releases but they sound on them is usually on the low side.  but, hell, the quality is great otherwise.

Yes, I'd even be happy with files a bit larger if he would up the sound a little.  I play these on flatscreen w/blueray player and surround, but gawd forbid if there's any other sound than the flic itself.

thanks yify.. 
they are demons to some and angels to others...

and Happy b'day pirate bay..
